channel-type.label: Battery Percent Remaining
channel-type.description: Indicates the estimated percentage of battery charge remaining until the battery will no longer be able to provide power to the Node

channel-type.label: Battery Charge Level
channel-type.description: Indicates a coarse ranking of the charge level of the battery, used to indicate when intervention is required

channel-type.label: Color
channel-type.description: The color channel allows to control the color of a light. It is also possible to dim values and switch the light on and off.

channel-type.label: Color Temperature
channel-type.description: Sets the color temperature of the light

channel-type.label: Color Temperature
channel-type.description: Sets the color temperature of the light in mirek

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Switches the power on and off

channel-type.label: Dimmer
channel-type.description: Sets the level of the light

channel-type.label: Mode Select
channel-type.description: Selection of 1 or more states

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Indication of a switch or remote being activated

channel-type.label: Switched Latched Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate the new value of the CurrentPosition attribute as a JSON object, i.e. after the move.

channel-type.label: Initial Press Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate the new value of the CurrentPosition attribute as a JSON object, i.e. while pressed.

channel-type.label: Long Press Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate the new value of the CurrentPosition attribute as a JSON object, i.e. while long pressed.

channel-type.label: Short Release Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate the previous value of the CurrentPosition attribute as a JSON object, i.e. just prior to a short release.

channel-type.label: Long Release Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate the previous value of the CurrentPosition attribute as a JSON object, i.e. just prior to a long release.

channel-type.label: Multi-Press Ongoing Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate 2 numeric fields as a JSON object. The first is the new value of the CurrentPosition attribute, i.e. while pressed. The second is the multi press code with a value of N when the Nth press of a multi-press sequence has been detected.

channel-type.label: Multi-Press Complete Trigger
channel-type.description: This trigger shall indicate 2 numeric fields as a JSON object. The first is the new value of the CurrentPosition attribute, i.e. while pressed. The second is how many times the momentary switch has been pressed in a multi-press sequence.

channel-type.label: Local Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the local temperature provided by the thermostat

channel-type.label: Outdoor Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the outdoor temperature provided by the thermostat

channel-type.label: Occupied Heating Setpoint
channel-type.description: Sets the heating temperature when the room is occupied

channel-type.label: Occupied Cooling Setpoint
channel-type.description: Sets the cooling temperature when the room is occupied

channel-type.label: Unoccupied Heating Setpoint
channel-type.description: Sets the heating temperature when the room is unoccupied

channel-type.label: Unoccupied Cooling Setpoint
channel-type.description: Sets the cooling temperature when the room is unoccupied

channel-type.label: System Mode
channel-type.description: Sets the system mode of the thermostat

channel-type.label: Running Mode
channel-type.description: The running mode of the thermostat

channel-type.label: Window Covering Lift
channel-type.description: Sets the window covering level - supporting open/close and up/down type commands

channel-type.label: Fan Mode
channel-type.description: Sets the fan mode

channel-type.label: Fan Speed
channel-type.description: The current fan speed percentage

channel-type.label: Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the temperature reading

channel-type.label: Humidity
channel-type.description: Indicates the current relative humidity

channel-type.label: Occupancy
channel-type.description: Indicates if an occupancy sensor is triggered

channel-type.label: Illumination
channel-type.description: Indicates the brightness in Lux.

channel-type.label: Boolean State
channel-type.description: Indicates a boolean, true or false, value

channel-type.label: Signal
channel-type.description: Wi-Fi signal strength indicator.

channel-type.label: Door Lock State
channel-type.description: Locks and unlocks the door and maintains the lock state

channel-type.label: Door Sensor State
channel-type.description: Door Sensor State

channel-type.label: Door Lock Alarm
channel-type.description: Event that fires when a lock alarm occurs with a payload containing the alarm code

channel-type.label: Door Lock Lock Operation Error
channel-type.description: Event that fires when a lock operation error occurs with a payload containing the lock operation type

channel-type.label: Run Mode
channel-type.description: Selects the run mode (idle, cleaning, mapping) of the robotic vacuum cleaner

channel-type.label: Clean Mode
channel-type.description: Selects the cleaning mode (vacuum, mop etc.) of the robotic vacuum cleaner

channel-type.label: Operational State
channel-type.description: Reports the operational state of the robotic vacuum cleaner

channel-type.label: Go Home
channel-type.description: Sends the robotic vacuum cleaner back to the dock

channel-type.label: Area Selection
channel-type.description: Toggle to enable a mapped area for cleaning

channel-type.label: Air Quality
channel-type.description: Indicates the currently measured air quality.

channel-type.label: CO2 Concentration
channel-type.description: Indicates the measured carbon dioxide concentration in parts per million (ppm).

channel-type.label: CO Concentration
channel-type.description: Indicates the measured carbon monoxide concentration in parts per million (ppm).

channel-type.label: Expressed State
channel-type.description: Indicates the visibly and audibly expressed alarm state with the highest priority.

channel-type.label: Smoke Alarm
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the smoke sensor is currently triggering an alarm.

channel-type.label: CO Alarm
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the CO sensor is currently triggering an alarm.

channel-type.label: Battery Alert
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the battery power resource fault detection is triggered.

channel-type.label: Device Muted
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the audible expression of the device is currently muted.

channel-type.label: Test In Progress
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the device self-test is currently activated.

channel-type.label: Hardware Fault
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the hardware fault detection mechanism is triggered.

channel-type.label: End Of Service
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the end-of-service has been triggered at the device.

channel-type.label: Interconnect Smoke Alarm
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the interconnected smoke alarm is currently triggering from another device.

channel-type.label: Interconnect CO Alarm
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the interconnected CO alarm is currently triggering from another device.

channel-type.label: Contamination State
channel-type.description: Indicates the contamination level of the smoke sensor.

channel-type.label: Smoke Sensitivity
channel-type.description: Indicates the sensitivity level of the smoke sensor.

channel-type.label: Expiry Date
channel-type.description: Indicates the date when the device reaches its stated expiry date.
